creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: a procession of farm animals; from L: a sheep, a donkey chicken, calf, duck, and a steer; blue background with wood grain; two palm trees at L
markings: LRC, red seal: CLEMENT HERD; LLC, in pencil: Animals; LRC, in pencil: [Clement Herd]; LRC, in pencil: [2003.211]
title: Animals
